mapper.insert: replace into device(id, ip, city, device_manufacturer, device_type, os, os_name, os_version, border_group, border_name, border_type, browser_manufacturer, browser_version, browser_engine,created_time) values (#{device.id}, #{device.ip}, #{device.city}, #{device.deviceManufacturer}, #{device.deviceType}, #{device.os}, #{device.osName}, #{device.osVersion}, #{device.borderGroup}, #{device.borderName}, #{device.borderType}, #{device.browserManufacturer}, #{device.browserVersion}, #{device.browserEngine},#{device.createdTime})
mapper.select: select id, ip, city, device_manufacturer, device_type, os, os_name, os_version, border_group, border_name, border_type, browser_manufacturer, browser_version, browser_engine, created_time from device
